thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Donald

author: Donald
title: Donald
text: I loved your website it's very straight forward. There's not a lot of steps like other sites. Booking my flight was a pleasure using your site. It's quick and to the point of what I wanted without all the hassle of too many steps to finish your booking. I also liked that when I was timed out that when I went back in to search the same flight my information was still there, unlike other sites I would have had to renter all my information again. Great experience and I'll definitely recommend you.
